exmls.content:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ButtonSkin" states="up,down,disabled" minHeight="50" minWidth="100" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" alpha.disabled="0.5"
            
             source="login_bt_png" scale9Grid="22,24,17,22" source.down="login_bt_png"/>
    <e:Label id="labelDisplay" top="8" bottom="8" left="8" right="8"
             size="28" fontFamily="Tahoma 'Microsoft Yahei'"
             textColor="0xFFFFFF" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center"/>
    <e:Image id="iconDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ChannelToggleButtionSkin" states="up,down,disabled" minHeight="50" minWidth="100" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" alpha.disabled="0.5"
            
             scale9Grid="22,24,17,22" source="tab_bg_png" source.down="tab_hover_bg_png"/>
    <e:Label id="labelDisplay" top="8" bottom="8" left="8" right="8"
             size="30" fontFamily="Tahoma 'Microsoft Yahei'"
             textColor="0xFFFFFF" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" textColor.down="0xFFF000" size.down="30" size.up="30"/>
    <e:Image id="iconDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.CheckBoxSkin" states="up,down,disabled,upAndSelected,downAndSelected,disabledAndSelected" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Group width="100%" height="100%">
        <e:layout>
            <e:HorizontalLayout verticalAlign="middle"/>
        </e:layout>
        <e:Image fillMode="scale" alpha="1" alpha.disabled="0.5" alpha.down="0.7"
                 source="checkbox_unselect_png"
                 source.upAndSelected="checkbox_select_up_png"
                 source.downAndSelected="checkbox_select_down_png"
                 source.disabledAndSelected="checkbox_select_disabled_png"/>
        <e:Label id="labelDisplay" size="20" textColor="0x707070"
                 textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"
                 fontFamily="Tahoma"/>
    </e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="skins.CommonTextInputSkin" minHeight="40" minWidth="300" states="normal,disabled,normalWithPrompt,disabledWithPrompt" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
 	<e:EditableText id="textDisplay" left="6" right="6"
	                textColor.disabled="0xff0000" width="100%" size="40"  bottom="6" top="6" verticalAlign="middle" textColor="0xFFFFFF"/>
	<e:Label id="promptDisplay" left="6" right="6"
	                width="100%" size="40" touchEnabled="false" includeIn="normalWithPrompt,disabledWithPrompt" verticalAlign="middle" top="6" bottom="6" textColor="0x9C9C9C"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.HScrollBarSkin" minWidth="20" minHeight="8" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="roundthumb_png" scale9Grid="3,3,2,2" height="8" width="30" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.HSliderSkin" minWidth="20" minHeight="8" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="track" source="track_sb_png" scale9Grid="1,1,4,4" width="100%"
             height="6" verticalCenter="0"/>
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="thumb_png" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ItemRendererSkin" states="up,down,disabled" minHeight="80" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" height="80">
	<e:Rect fillColor="0x16171C" left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0" fillColor.down="0x04024D" fillColor.disabled="0x252525" strokeWeight="1"/>
	<e:Group left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0">
		<e:Image id="faceImg" left="10" verticalCenter="0" width="50" height="50" source="head_png"/>
		<e:Group height="50" width="100%" x="63" y="21">
			<e:Label id="labelDisplay" size="23" fontFamily="Tahoma 'Microsoft Yahei'" textColor="0xFFFFFF" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="left" y="8" left="0" width="100%" text="{data.nickname}"/>
			<e:Group height="20" width="100%" y="25" x="0">
				<e:Label text="lv.25" x="6" y="11" size="18" textColor="0x262DFF" width="39"/>
				<e:Group height="100%" width="100%" x="36" y="8"/>
				<e:Label text="power.9999" x="93" y="13" size="18" textColor="0xFF00FA" width="95"/>
				<e:layout>
					<e:HorizontalLayout/>
				</e:layout>
			</e:Group>
			<e:layout>
				<e:VerticalLayout gap="8"/>
			</e:layout>
		</e:Group>
		<e:Image source="Add_buddy_bt_png" verticalCenter="0" right="5"/>
		<e:layout>
			<e:HorizontalLayout horizontalAlign="left" verticalAlign="middle" paddingLeft="10" paddingRight="10" gap="10"/>
		</e:layout>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.PanelSkin" minHeight="230" minWidth="450" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image left="0" right="0" bottom="0"  top="0" source="border_png" scale9Grid="2,2,12,12" />
    <e:Group id="moveArea" left="0" right="0" top="0" height="45">
        <e:Image left="0" right="0" bottom="0"  top="0" source="header_png"/>
        <e:Label id="titleDisplay" size="20" fontFamily="Tahoma" textColor="0xFFFFFF"
                 wordWrap="false" left="15" right="5" verticalCenter="0"/>
    </e:Group>
    <e:Button id="closeButton" label="close" bottom="5" horizontalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ProgressBarSkin" minWidth="30" minHeight="18" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Image source="track_pb_png" scale9Grid="1,1,4,4" width="100%"
			 height="100%" verticalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Image id="thumb" height="100%" width="100%" source="thumb_pb_png"/>
	<e:Label id="labelDisplay" textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"
			 size="15" fontFamily="Tahoma" textColor="0x707070"
			 horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.RadioButtonSkin" states="up,down,disabled,upAndSelected,downAndSelected,disabledAndSelected" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Group width="100%" height="100%">
        <e:layout>
            <e:HorizontalLayout verticalAlign="middle"/>
        </e:layout>
        <e:Image fillMode="scale" alpha="1" alpha.disabled="0.5" alpha.down="0.7"
                 source="radiobutton_unselect_png"
                 source.upAndSelected="radiobutton_select_up_png"
                 source.downAndSelected="radiobutton_select_down_png"
                 source.disabledAndSelected="radiobutton_select_disabled_png"/>
        <e:Label id="labelDisplay" size="20" textColor="0x707070"
                 textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"
                 fontFamily="Tahoma"/>
    </e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ScrollerSkin" minWidth="20" minHeight="20" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:HScrollBar id="horizontalScrollBar" width="100%" bottom="0"/>
    <e:VScrollBar id="verticalScrollBar" height="100%" right="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="skins.TextInputSkin" minHeight="40" minWidth="300" states="normal,disabled,normalWithPrompt,disabledWithPrompt" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Image left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0" source="Input_box_png" scale9Grid="12,24,7,25"/>
 	<e:EditableText id="textDisplay" left="6" right="6"
	                textColor.disabled="0xff0000" width="100%" size="40"  bottom="6" top="6" verticalAlign="middle" textColor="0xFFFFFF"/>
	<e:Label id="promptDisplay" left="6" right="6"
	                width="100%" size="40" touchEnabled="false" includeIn="normalWithPrompt,disabledWithPrompt" verticalAlign="middle" top="6" bottom="6" textColor="0x9C9C9C"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ToggleSwitchSkin" states="up,down,disabled,upAndSelected,downAndSelected,disabledAndSelected" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image source="on_png"
             source.up="off_png"
             source.down="off_png"
             source.disabled="off_png"/>
    <e:Image source="handle_png"
             horizontalCenter="-18"
             horizontalCenter.upAndSelected="18"
             horizontalCenter.downAndSelected="18"
             horizontalCenter.disabledAndSelected="18"
             verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.VScrollBarSkin" minWidth="8" minHeight="20" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="roundthumb_png" scale9Grid="3,3,2,2" height="30" width="8" horizontalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.VSliderSkin" minWidth="25" minHeight="30" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="track" source="track_png" scale9Grid="1,1,4,4" width="7" height="100%" horizontalCenter="0"/>
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="thumb_png" horizontalCenter="0" />
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="ChatCellForOtherSkin" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Group left="0" top="0" bottom="0" right="0">
		<e:Image id="headImg" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" source="head_png"/>
		<e:Group height="100%" width="100%" x="8" y="63">
			<e:Group width="100%" y="31" height="25" left="1">
				<e:Label id="nickLabel" textColor="0x858FA2" size="25" text="13:03  xxxxxx" top="0" left="16"/>
			</e:Group>
			<e:Group id="messageGroup" height="100%" x="36" y="5">
				<e:Image id="backImg" top="0" bottom="0" left="0" width="165" source="left_dialog_png" scale9Grid="23,41,22,14"/>
				<e:Label id="textLabel" multiline="true" lineSpacing="8" size="28" verticalCenter="-2" left="33" text="哈哈" textColor="0xFFFFFF"/>
			</e:Group>
			<e:layout>
				<e:VerticalLayout/>
			</e:layout>
		</e:Group>
		<e:layout>
			<e:HorizontalLayout horizontalAlign="right" verticalAlign="top"/>
		</e:layout>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="ChatCellForSelfSkin" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" height="86">
	<e:Group top="0" bottom="0" left="0" right="0">
		<e:Group id="messageGroup" height="100%" width="100%" x="36" y="5">
			<e:Group height="25" width="100%" x="50" y="14">
				<e:Label id="nickLabel" text="13:03  xxxxxx" size="25" textColor="0x858FA2" y="0" right="20"/>
			</e:Group>
			<e:Group left="0" right="0" top="24" height="100%">
				<e:Image id="backImg" top="0" source="right_dialog_png" scale9Grid="12,44,26,15" right="0" width="89" bottom="0"/>
				<e:Label id="textLabel" multiline="true" lineSpacing="8" size="28" text="哈哈" textColor="0xFFFFFF" right="33" verticalCenter="-2.5"/>
			</e:Group>
			<e:layout>
				<e:VerticalLayout gap="3" horizontalAlign="right"/>
			</e:layout>
		</e:Group>
		<e:Image id="headImg" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" source="head_png"/>
		<e:layout>
			<e:HorizontalLayout horizontalAlign="right" verticalAlign="top"/>
		</e:layout>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="ChatSkin" width="1136" height="640" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" xmlns:ns1="*" >
	<e:Rect id="background" left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0" fillColor="0x1A1D26" locked="true"/>
	<e:Group left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0">
		<e:Group id="topLayout" height="107" left="0" top="0" width="100%">
			<e:Image source="dialog_top_png" left="0" right="0" top="0" scale9Grid="3,13,18,81" bottom="0"/>
			<e:Group left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0">
				<e:ToggleButton id="worldTab" label="世界" x="18" top="0" skinName="skins.ChannelToggleButtionSkin"/>
				<e:ToggleButton id="privateTab" label="私聊" top="0" x="28" y="10" skinName="skins.ChannelToggleButtionSkin"/>
				<e:layout>
					<e:HorizontalLayout gap="-1"/>
				</e:layout>
			</e:Group>
		</e:Group>
		<e:Group height="100%" width="100%" x="351" y="316">
			<e:Scroller id="msgScroller" width="100%" x="0" height="100%" y="0">
				<e:Group id="scrollGroup">
					<e:layout>
						<e:VerticalLayout gap="25" paddingTop="10" paddingLeft="10" paddingRight="10" paddingBottom="10"/>
					</e:layout>
				</e:Group>
			</e:Scroller>
			<e:Image id="toggleListBtn" source="Open_ico_png" x="872" y="133"/>
			<e:Group id="privateListGroup" height="100%" width="260" y="168">
				<e:Rect left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0" fillColor="0x16171C"/>
				<e:Scroller width="100%" height="100%" scrollPolicyH="off">
					<e:List id="privateList" top="0" left="0" right="0" bottom="0" scrollEnabled="true"/>
				</e:Scroller>
				
			</e:Group>
			<e:layout>
				<e:HorizontalLayout verticalAlign="middle" gap="-5"/>
			</e:layout>
		</e:Group>
		<e:Group id="bottomLayout" left="0" bottom="0" height="152" width="100%">
			<e:Image source="dialog_bottom_png" scale9Grid="5,19,37,114" left="0" right="0" bottom="0" top="0"/>
			<e:Group top="0" right="0" left="0" bottom="0">
				<e:Image id="soundBtn" source="intercom_ico_png" x="19" y="531"/>
				<e:Group height="101" width="100%" x="133" y="51">
					<e:Image source="input-box_png" scale9Grid="20,12,6,77" left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0"/>
					<e:TextInput id="inputText" x="7" width="523" verticalCenter="0.5" skinName="skins.CommonTextInputSkin" height="82"/>
					<e:Rect id="arrowBtn" height="82" width="68" x="536" y="10" strokeAlpha="0" fillAlpha="0"/>
				</e:Group>
				<e:Image id="faceBtn" source="expression_ico_png" x="669" y="537"/>
				<e:Image id="addBtn" source="add_ico_png" x="763" y="531"/>
				<e:Image id="sendBtn" source="send_bt_png" x="864" y="519"/>
				<e:layout>
					<e:HorizontalLayout verticalAlign="middle" paddingRight="10" paddingLeft="10"/>
				</e:layout>
			</e:Group>
		</e:Group>
		<e:layout>
			<e:VerticalLayout gap="0"/>
		</e:layout>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Image id="closeBtn" source="close_png" top="10" right="15" locked="true"/>
	<e:Group id="initGroup" left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0" locked="true" visible="false">
		<e:Rect left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0"/>
		<e:Label id="stateLabel" text="...." horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="PopMenuSkin" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Rect id="popMenuBack" left="0" top="0" bottom="0" right="0" fillAlpha="0"/>
	<e:Group id="privateGroup" height="86" width="150" x="0" y="0">
		<e:Image source="popBack_png" scale9Grid="16,19,114,26" locked="true"/>
		<e:Label text="私  聊" y="17" horizontalCenter="0" locked="true"/>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="UserItemRenderSkin" width="400" height="300" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui"></e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="InitializeSkin" width="800" height="480" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Rect bottom="0" right="0" left="0" top="0" fillColor="0xEBEBEB" x="10" y="10" locked="true"/>
	<e:Group height="61" width="567" y="32" horizontalCenter="0">
		<e:Label text="昵称 " x="-75" y="79" textColor="0x000000" size="40"/>
		<e:TextInput id="nameInput" x="71" y="68" width="100%" height="52"/>
		<e:layout>
			<e:HorizontalLayout horizontalAlign="left" verticalAlign="middle"/>
		</e:layout>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group height="288" width="566" y="111" horizontalCenter="0">
		<e:Rect left="0" top="0" bottom="0" right="0" fillColor="0xD1D1D1" locked="true"/>
		<e:Rect id="selectRect" height="80" width="80" x="12" y="12" fillColor="0x32FF00"/>
		<e:Group id="headGroup" left="0" top="0" bottom="0" right="0">
			<e:layout>
				<e:TileLayout paddingLeft="12" paddingRight="12" paddingTop="12" paddingBottom="12" horizontalGap="12" verticalGap="12"/>
			</e:layout>
			<e:Image source="1_png" x="211" y="103"/>
			<e:Image source="2_png" x="289" y="120"/>
			<e:Image source="3_png" x="406" y="111"/>
			<e:Image source="4_png" x="429" y="164"/>
			<e:Image source="5_png" x="418" y="140"/>
			<e:Image source="6_png" x="392" y="155"/>
			<e:Image source="7_png" x="368" y="182"/>
			<e:Image source="8_png" x="295" y="167"/>
			<e:Image source="9_png" x="345" y="211"/>
			<e:Image source="10_png" x="438" y="130"/>
			<e:Image source="11_png" x="463" y="133"/>
			<e:Image source="12_png" x="502" y="142"/>
			<e:Image source="13_png" x="322" y="182"/>
			<e:Image source="14_png" x="312" y="220"/>
			<e:Image source="15_png" x="278" y="190"/>
			<e:Image source="16_png" x="349" y="207"/>
			<e:Image source="17_png" x="441" y="209"/>
			<e:Image source="18_png" x="506" y="200"/>
		</e:Group>
		<e:layout>
			<e:BasicLayout/>
		</e:layout>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Button id="inGameBtn" label="进入聊天" y="413" horizontalCenter="0" width="116"/>
	<e:Group id="initGroup" left="0" top="0" bottom="0" right="0" locked="true" visible="false">
		<e:Rect left="0" top="0" bottom="0" right="0" fillAlpha="1"/>
		<e:Label id="stateLabel" text="初始化..." horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" size="15"/>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="LoginSceneSkin" width="1136" height="640" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Group height="520" y="60" width="850" x="143">
		<e:Image source="login_bg_png" left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0" scale9Grid="124,106,747,7"/>
		<e:Label text="登录" y="31" size="36" horizontalCenter="0.5" textColor="0xB5B5B5"/>
		<e:Group height="100" y="122" left="72" right="72">
			<e:Label text="帐号:" x="39" y="31" size="32" textColor="0xB5B5B5"/>
			<e:TextInput id="nameInput" x="332" y="36" width="100%" skinName="skins.TextInputSkin"/>
			<e:Label id="registerBtn" text="注册用户" x="627" y="9" size="28" textColor="0xB5B5B5" height="78" verticalAlign="bottom"/>
			<e:layout>
				<e:HorizontalLayout verticalAlign="middle" gap="15" horizontalAlign="center"/>
			</e:layout>
		</e:Group>
		<e:Group height="100" y="228" left="72" right="72">
			<e:Label y="24" textColor="0xB5B5B5" size="32" text="密码:" x="28" locked="true"/>
			<e:Group height="85" width="100%" x="131" y="45">
				<e:TextInput id="pwdInput" left="0" top="0" bottom="0" right="0" displayAsPassword="true"/>
				<e:Image source="eyes_png" verticalCenter="0" right="10"/>
			</e:Group>
			<e:Label y="3" size="28" text="忘记密码" x="622" textColor="0x6296B4" height="77" verticalAlign="bottom" locked="true"/>
			<e:layout>
				<e:HorizontalLayout gap="15" horizontalAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"/>
			</e:layout>
		</e:Group>
		<e:Group height="69" y="338" left="72" right="72">
			<e:Button id="loginBtn" label="登    录" x="175" y="13" skinName="skins.ButtonSkin" width="55%"/>
			<e:Label id="autoLoginBtn" y="-6" size="28" text="游客登录" x="359" textColor="0x0079B6" height="69" verticalAlign="bottom"/>
			<e:layout>
				<e:HorizontalLayout gap="15" horizontalAlign="center"/>
			</e:layout>
		</e:Group>
		<e:Group height="50" y="450" left="80" right="80">
			<e:Label y="24" textColor="0xB5B5B5" size="24" text="第三方帐号登录:" x="-10"/>
			<e:Image source="qq_png" x="320" y="15"/>
			<e:Image source="weibo_png" x="270" y="12"/>
			<e:Image source="weixin_png" x="204" y="13"/>
			<e:layout>
				<e:HorizontalLayout horizontalAlign="right" verticalAlign="middle"/>
			</e:layout>
		</e:Group>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="RegisterSceneSkin" width="800" height="480" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Rect bottom="0" left="0" fillColor="0xEBEBEB" top="0" right="0" y="20" x="20" locked="true"/>
	<e:Group left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0">
		<e:Label text="帐号注册" size="50" textColor="0x000000" horizontalCenter="0" top="20"/>
		<e:Group height="318" width="722" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0">
			<e:Group height="100%" width="100%" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0">
				<e:Rect fillColor="0xDDDDDD" left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0"/>
				<e:Group left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0">
					<e:Group y="35" width="503" horizontalCenter="1" height="55" x="10">
						<e:layout>
							<e:HorizontalLayout verticalAlign="middle"/>
						</e:layout>
						<e:Label y="13" textColor="0x000000" size="40" text="帐号：" x="0"/>
						<e:TextInput id="nameInput" width="100%" y="8" height="52" x="123" prompt="4-15字符"/>
					</e:Group>
					<e:Group height="55" width="503" y="25" horizontalCenter="1">
						<e:Label y="13" textColor="0x000000" size="40" text="昵称：" x="0"/>
						<e:TextInput id="nicknameInput" x="123" width="100%" y="8" height="52" restrict="0-9a-zA-Z" prompt="2-15字符"/>
						<e:layout>
							<e:HorizontalLayout verticalAlign="middle"/>
						</e:layout>
					</e:Group>
					<e:Group y="82" width="503" height="55" horizontalCenter="1">
						<e:layout>
							<e:HorizontalLayout verticalAlign="middle"/>
						</e:layout>
						<e:Label y="153" textColor="0x000000" size="40" text="密码：" x="152"/>
						<e:TextInput id="pwdInput" y="148" x="275" width="100%" height="52" displayAsPassword="true" prompt="5-15字符"/>
					</e:Group>
					<e:Group y="142" width="503" horizontalCenter="1" height="55" x="10">
						<e:layout>
							<e:HorizontalLayout verticalAlign="middle"/>
						</e:layout>
						<e:Label y="153" textColor="0x000000" size="40" text="重复：" x="152"/>
						<e:TextInput id="rpwdInput" y="148" width="100%" height="52" displayAsPassword="true" x="275" prompt="5-15字符"/>
					</e:Group>
					<e:Group y="152" width="503" horizontalCenter="1" height="55" x="20">
						<e:layout>
							<e:HorizontalLayout verticalAlign="middle" horizontalAlign="center"/>
						</e:layout>
						<e:Label y="153" textColor="0x000000" size="40" text="验证码：" x="152"/>
						<e:TextInput id="codeInput" y="148" x="275" width="100%" height="52"/>
						<e:Image id="codeImg" source="header_png" x="480" y="15" width="150" height="60"/>
					</e:Group>
					<e:layout>
						<e:VerticalLayout horizontalAlign="center" paddingTop="10"/>
					</e:layout>
				</e:Group>
			</e:Group>
			<e:layout>
				<e:HorizontalLayout gap="0"/>
			</e:layout>
		</e:Group>
		<e:Button id="registerBtn" label="注   册" y="407" width="115" horizontalCenter="0.5"/>
		<e:layout>
			<e:VerticalLayout horizontalAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"/>
		</e:layout>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>
